channel.title: Action Buttons? AB? CMD?
channel.description: Base is DeltaCleaned 1.5 I want to make it so when I click on an object or click a teleport or emote in emote tab it would say something like AB = #### or something, In reg delta I did it but I can't in this source

item.title: Action Buttons? AB? CMD?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

didn’t work.

got it: stole it from a reg delta source:

[code]case 185:
// clicking most buttons
actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
if (!validClient)
break;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“isaac”)){
println(“ab=” + actionButtonId);
}
if (!antiHax())
break;
resetAction();

			server.ActionButtons.Buttons(playerId);
			break;

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Action Buttons? AB? CMD?
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[code]	if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourNameHere")){
		println("ab=" + actionButtonId);
		}
    [/code]

Put it somewhere around case 185 (Button Clicking)
